server.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage database connection, as well as get various DAO classes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database()
      Constructor - initialize pointers to all DAO classes
